summary: Cold water swimming helps treat depression, suggests a BMJ case report of a 24-year-old who reduced her medication while...
caption: Cold water swimming helps treat depression, suggests a BMJ case report of a 24-year-old who reduced her medication while swimming weekly in open water, and was drug-and symptom-free within four months. To date, she remains medication-free and is still swimming.

summary: I finished this book about a week ago and it was a very interesting and informative read on the current research that microbes...
caption:
I finished this book about a week ago and it was a very interesting and informative read on the current research that microbes correlate with everything from common day allergies, obesity, autism, etc. It was eye opening and thought provoking especially as I have been fixated on the potential health of my gut flora.

At the same time though, it had the effect of making me hyper-paranoid. Was my reoccurring and increasingly bad eczema caused because of doses of antibiotics I had when getting surgeries (3 so far), or being put on for infections? Am I at risk for allergies because my life has become too sterile, and my diet to Western?

It produced this overflow of thoughts and food aversions, as well as feelings of guilt if I indulged in a dessert when out celebrating my friend’s birthday, or if my boyfriend and I had a dirty dinner night, aka eating pizza and watching movies- was I inadvertently messing up my body?

blog.name: saudmasud
blog.title: Khawaja Saud Masud
blog.description:
Khawaja Saud Masud is the CEO of Vector Partners (Pvt.) Ltd., a business consultancy and capacity building firm.

www.vectorpartnerspl.com

He started Vector Partners in 2015 with the following vision and mission:

VISION:To provide high quality and bespoke financial advisory and management consulting services for our clients. Furthermore, under a dual mandate, we also aim to help develop and strengthen Pakistan’s human capital base and be the most trusted skills-development platform. We are passionate about enhancing Pakistan’s workforce capabilities and productivity and helping unleash its “unstoppable”
potential as the country transforms into a knowledge economy.

MISSION: To provide advanced consulting capability in carrying out client transactions and to offer core individual and institutional skills training for competitive positioning domestically and worldwide. We intend to fully leverage our global
expertise, knowledge base and network of 50+ highly skilled professionals, industry leaders, public figures and trainers as our “partners-in-vison” to
address all our client needs and deliver measurable results.

He has 20 years of diverse experience inlcuding Wall Street, Fortune 500 firms, Silicon
Valley-based startups and other multinational firms. Visiting faculty member at Pakistan's top ranked Business School at Iqra University and promoter of youth
Entrepreneurship via multiple platforms including NGOs and educational institutions. MBA & BSEE both from Virginia Tech, Virginia, USA.

He is passionate about personal development and promoting youth entreprise. In his view we live in a world of abundance but with all the noise, negativity and distractions it is easy to get lost. He believes in living to our maximum potential as human beings using the power of knowledge sharing - life lessons,
productive thoughts, transformative ideas, useful tips and individual
inspirations.

Mr. Masud strongly believes in the saying by Seneca “Luck is what happens when opportunity meets preparation.” He is a strong proponent of road mapping
one’s future with the assistance of mentors.

summary: Walk it off! Sometimes after a few days of work and exercise the body needs a breather or a walk-off. Tune into your favorite...
caption:
Walk it off! Sometimes after a few days of work and exercise the body needs a breather or a walk-off. Tune into your favorite podcast, music playlist or audiobook and 60-90 minutes fly by. Get in your daily activity at low intensity and clear your mind, rest your knees (relatively speaking) and be productive, all the same time. #health #mindfulness #walking #podcast #audibook #music #productive

summary: New England Patriots vs. Jacksonville Jaguars Prediction and Preview https://ift.tt/eA8V8J
title: New England Patriots vs. Jacksonville Jaguars Prediction and Preview https://ift.tt/eA8V8J
description:
The New England Patriots and Jacksonville Jaguars are familiar with one another. Back in January, the two faced off in the AFC Championship Game. The Patriots prevailed with a 24-20 victory after outscoring the Jaguars 14-3 in the fourth quarter.

Both teams coming into this game after earning narrow victories in Week 1. New England beat the Houston Texans 27-20 despite being outscored 14-6 in the second half. Meanwhile, Jacksonville went on the road to hand Tom Coughlin’s former team, the New York Giants, a 20-15 loss.


Read the full story on Athlon Sports

title: The Sock
body:
Hi, everyone! Back to flash fiction again. I’ve been writing bits and pieces about this character for a while. This week, he had a story to tell me.

—

The Sock

The bed creaked as Jeff turned over and pulled the quilt over his aching head. Like some little bastard pounding an anvil in there. His beard itched, his blood sugar was probably in the red zone—no, make that definitely, his queasy stomach…

View On WordPress

summary: Confused by the latest dietary advice? Here’s why not to be (Oliver Burkeman, The Guardian, Sep 14 2018) “In other words, far...
caption:
Confused by the latest dietary advice? Here’s why not to be (Oliver Burkeman, The Guardian, Sep 14 2018)

“In other words, far from throwing anything into doubt, these studies add weight to what you already knew: you should eat plenty of vegetables, not too much meat, very little processed junk or added sugar, and stop before you’re stuffed.

Or, in the famous summation of the author Michael Pollan: “Eat food, not too much, mostly plants.”

This is the real oddity of nutrition science: not simply that nobody knows anything, but that, somehow, nobody knows anything and we already know all we need to know.

There’s a good public health argument for studying the details.

But on a personal level, unless you’re already doing a perfect job of eating a high-veg, moderate-meat, low-junk diet, that’s what to focus on.

No fiddling with the technicalities could possibly have so much impact. And it’s not just nutrition, either.

You already know how to exercise (move around a lot, sometimes near the limits of your capacities) and how to manage your time (protect time for the most important stuff, preferably first thing, and stay off social media).

You know how to date (put yourself in social situations repeatedly, and don’t be an arse) and how to nurture a relationship (listen hard).

We forget we know all this, in part, because of an advice industry that fixates on exciting new details, in order to sell its wares. But it’s our fault, too: we crave novelty, and the old advice seems boring.

And so we become what the satirist of business life Laurence Peter called “side-issue specialists”, whose motto is “look after the molehills, and the mountains will look after themselves”.

In truth, though, you’ve no right to dismiss the old advice as boring if you haven’t implemented it yet. It’s old for a reason: so far, nobody’s managed to kill it.”

blog.name: mensbodybuildingtips
blog.title: Mens Bodybuilding Tips
blog.description: Physical Therapist and Fitness Consultant. I bring you some Amazing Bodybuilding exercises along with high protein tips and workouts for health and weight loss

title: Big Bench
body:
Everybody wants a bigger bench press! There is no hiding this reality when you most likely to the health club on a Monday– which is unofficially the National Bench Day! After a weekend of remainder, most individuals are nervous to obtain under the bar and push themselves to the max. I share your excitement. When I first started working out, I intended to bench extra and also more weight with each weekly workout. After numerous years of progression complying with regimens I read around, I started to cultivate techniques in order to help me reach new levels of strength and power. I eventually paired with Jim Parrish, among the brightest minds in the toughness globe, as well as have been able to establish many world bench press records as a outcome. Currently, I would certainly like to let you in on a few of my secret suggestions to help you also push more weight than ever.

The secret to a strong bench is to concentrate on the bench press. Simple as that. On my bench day I concentrate on the flat bench only– no slope or decrease, no dumbbell job. That’s not to state assistance work isn’t really essential, but it will be watched only as that: to help in the growth of the bench press.

The key to being strong is to focus on improving your central nervous system (CNS) response. If you keep your CNS fresh and avoid taxing your neural feedback, you will certainly take your strength to a much higher level, as well as you will certainly keep that strength over the long haul.

Two of the most common ways a lifter will certainly tax his CNS is always benching in the one- to three-rep range and overtraining on a regular basis. Every time you do a workout with establishes being composed of 1-3 associates, a effective neural response is required to focus the optimum muscular contraction in performance of the heavy set. This optimum effort is lessened with each successive set as well as quickly leads to overtraining– not to discuss feasible strain or injury to your shoulder joints and connective tissue.

Train to obtain massive! See exactly what Steve Kuclo provides for size and also toughness.

In order to avoid neural overtraining, you should reset your nervous system. So, if you will compete in a bench or power meet or have a few workouts consisting of sets of 1-3 reps, your next several workouts later will be your normal training array, including sets at 8-10 reps each.

The biggest mistake lifters make is that they don’t transform up their regular on a routine regular and calculated basis. In order to maintain my CNS fresh and also constantly adapting—and my muscles growing ever before more powerful– I do a great deal of training with bands. Jim has had me using bands from ironwoodyftness.com for many years.

I rotate through different strength bands every time I train. Each band has a different tension, which additionally compels me to change the bar weights every week. This completes 3 important benefits: First, the neural input is vastly increased because of the proprioceptive stimulation, where the bands force your muscles to work harder to press straight up. Second, by altering the weights regularly, I am able to generate maximal pushing pressure without benching topmost weights every workout. Finally, constantly pushing against the resistance of the bands causes my tendons and ligaments to get stronger, also, which aids increase benching force and prevents against injury. You can significantly boost your strength without getting too much muscle or mass (including fat) just by increasing the strength of your tendons and ligaments.

To build a massive bench press max, the first thing you need to do is to order a starter set of bands from ironwoodyftness.com. You will also should produce a couple of densities of boards to help limit range of activity. As soon as you obtain these in your hands, take a week or two to rear of your present program and do some high-rep sets to reset your training type and neural response. - FLEX

Currently, I would certainly like to let you in on a few of my secret suggestions to help you also push more weight than ever.

The secret to a strong bench is to concentrate on the bench press. Simple as that. On my bench day I concentrate on the flat bench only– no slope or decrease, no dumbbell job. That’s not to state assistance work isn’t really essential, but it will be watched only as that: to help in the growth of the bench press.

The key to being strong is to focus on improving your central nervous system (CNS) response. If you keep your CNS fresh and avoid taxing your neural feedback, you will certainly take your strength to a much higher level, as well as you will certainly keep that strength over the long haul.

Two of the most common ways a lifter will certainly tax his CNS is always benching in the one- to three-rep range and overtraining on a regular basis. Every time you do a workout with establishes being composed of 1-3 associates, a effective neural response is required to focus the optimum muscular contraction in performance of the heavy set. This optimum effort is lessened with each successive set as well as quickly leads to overtraining– not to discuss feasible strain or injury to your shoulder joints and connective tissue.

Train to obtain massive! See exactly what Steve Kuclo provides for size and also toughness.

In order to avoid neural overtraining, you should reset your nervous system. So, if you will compete in a bench or power meet or have a few workouts consisting of sets of 1-3 reps, your next several workouts later will be your normal training array, including sets at 8-10 reps each.

The biggest mistake lifters make is that they don’t transform up their regular on a routine regular and calculated basis. In order to maintain my CNS fresh and also constantly adapting—and my muscles growing ever before more powerful– I do a great deal of training with bands. Jim has had me using bands from ironwoodyftness.com for many years.

I rotate through different strength bands every time I train. Each band has a different tension, which additionally compels me to change the bar weights every week. This completes 3 important benefits: First, the neural input is vastly increased because of the proprioceptive stimulation, where the bands force your muscles to work harder to press straight up. Second, by altering the weights regularly, I am able to generate maximal pushing pressure without benching topmost weights every workout. Finally, constantly pushing against the resistance of the bands causes my tendons and ligaments to get stronger, also, which aids increase benching force and prevents against injury. You can significantly boost your strength without getting too much muscle or mass (including fat) just by increasing the strength of your tendons and ligaments.

To build a massive bench press max, the first thing you need to do is to order a starter set of bands from ironwoodyftness.com. You will also should produce a couple of densities of boards to help limit range of activity. As soon as you obtain these in your hands, take a week or two to rear of your present program and do some high-rep sets to reset your training type and neural response. - FLEX

blog.name: entirebodyexercise
blog.title: Entire Body Exercise
blog.description: A Fitness Consultant, empowering people to live a healthy and long life. I bring you some great tips on health, fitness, diet and more.

summary: Hiking: How it blasts calories and boosts weight loss
title: Hiking: How it blasts calories and boosts weight loss
body:
We’re big fans of strolling below at Chatelaine. It’s the solitary most popular kind of workout all over the world, and the health benefits are tremendous. It’s viable to utilize strolling as your single fitness routine to attain optimum wellness, physical performance as well as reap the effective weight loss benefits if you do it enough.

Walking a mile isn’t really visiting melt the same variety of calories as running one, but ending up being a runner is tough and except every person. I know this due to the fact that I tried and failed the initial few times. Some individuals are never visiting really feel the love for running that some do, and also that’s where treking could be an excellent compromise in between both. Continue reading for several of one of the most crucial benefits you will get from treking:

1. Increased caloric burn
Burning calories isn’t the most vital thing when it pertains to exercise, but it could still make a significant contribution to a weight management or upkeep program. Hiking is visiting melt a lot a lot more calories each hr compared to walking does. Judging by the rise in your heart and breathing rates, the uphill part of hiking is similar, from a calorie-expenditure perspective, to that of a moderately-paced run.

2. It’s a rational progression
Mentally it’s simpler to push on your own while treking than it is while running. If you’re ready to accelerate your exercise program, however running isn’t really in the cards (whether because of an injury or lack of passion), after that treking is a great alternative. If you’re wanting to at some point run, treking is additionally a great entrance workout as it will create up your cardio physical fitness as well as reinforce your leg muscular tissues when you’ve plateaued with your usual walking routine.

3. It’s easier to obtain to than you think
Hiking can be done anywhere there’s a hill. I do not require to eliminate to the Rocky Hills to go for a walk, and for the beginner, there are a lot of areas within a very brief drive that have huge enough hillsides to obtain the exact same physical effect. For those of you who can’t access a hill, strolling on a treadmill at an overstated incline will certainly create a similar encounter, though we do recommend getting outdoors. The Trans Canada Path web site has an interactive map that could assist you find locations in your district.

4. It could be social and also adventurous
If you reside in an urban location, treking can produce a wonderful weekend task. You may want to venture out somewhere with a fantastic view on top and/or take buddies with you. Questing to be the first on top is built-in inspiration as well as you’ll be experiencing each various other in a new setting. As opposed to resting enjoying a film together for a couple of hrs, why not get out as well as challenge your friends and family to press themselves in an outside setting (as well as the fantastic advantages of fresh air).

5. Treking is a total-body workout
Though a lot of the motion happens from the midsection down, your arms can get worked more if you make use of hiking poles. Also if you don’t, there’s going to be a lot even more moving and also pumping arm motion compared to with walking.

Your core will be much more engaged to maintain your body stable while examining rougher surface, while the butt, thigh as well as calf bone muscle mass will be shedding by the time you’re via. Your reduced body will come to be more potent, much more toned as well as muscle with hiking compared to with a less different strolling program. Due to the fact that it’s more challenging cardio work, your heart and lungs will get a wonderful advantage as well.

How to obtain going, the basic method
Grab a pair of shoes with great hold and take a pal. Locate some hillsides in your area and have at it. This doesn’t have to be made complex. Bringing water as well as a cell phone is a great idea. Beginning with something smaller sized and also see how you really feel regarding the physical effort. If you like pushing on your own and also the contentment of reaching the top, then you need to await something more challenging.

Once you’ve gotten comfortable with the rate, and developed the endurance to attempt something riskier, you’ll should do even more preparation. The more difficult treks need additional money and time, yet it beats a Sunday on the sofa does not it? As well as, when the ladies at the office ask you just how your weekend was, you’ll have stories of adventure, plus photos as well as memories that last.

This type of hiking has to do with leaving town. If you’re brand-new, I recommend beginning with a pre-arranged group. I reside in Calgary when I browse “Calgary hiking teams” I see tons of options, so do the same with your city as well as begin there.

Some gear you’ll need:
- Good hiking boots or shoes
- A moderate-sized, comfy backpack
- A warmer layer in situation it obtains cold
- Water and food
- Cell phone
- Small first aid kit
- Bear spray can be an excellent idea
- A hat
- Emergency rain coat (the $2 disposable variety need to be fine)
- Sunscreen
- Camera
- Replacement shoes laces
- Extra socks
- Sunglasses
- Mosquito repellent
- Small flashlight in situation you finish up strolling in the dark
- Emergency fire-starting supplies
- You likewise might wish to think about toilet paper (simply in situation)

Remember to clothe pleasantly and know that greater elevations could be cooler, even snow-covered relying on how high you’re climbing.

When going out with a team, make sure to select one that is in line with your physical fitness degree. If you require inspiration, e-mail this short article to a friend and ask her or him if they wish to attempt some hiking with you. Doing this as a group, with somebody you’re close to, is an assured incentive. You’ll wind up having great deals of fantastic tales to share as well as having actually recently firmed butts to reveal off won’t harm either.

It’s not a race, so be sure to enjoy the sight while you go to it. We promise it’s more fun compared to seeing reruns on the TV at the gym.

James S. Fell, MBA, is an accredited strength as well as conditioning specialist in Calgary. He writes the syndicated column “In-Your-Face Physical fitness” for the Chicago Tribune and seeks advice from customers on strategic preparing for fitness as well as health and wellness. Obtain your totally free Metabolic process Record here.

Your reduced body will come to be more potent, much more toned as well as muscle with hiking compared to with a less different strolling program. Due to the fact that it’s more challenging cardio work, your heart and lungs will get a wonderful advantage as well.

How to obtain going, the basic method
Grab a pair of shoes with great hold and take a pal. Locate some hillsides in your area and have at it. This doesn’t have to be made complex. Bringing water as well as a cell phone is a great idea. Beginning with something smaller sized and also see how you really feel regarding the physical effort. If you like pushing on your own and also the contentment of reaching the top, then you need to await something more challenging.

Once you’ve gotten comfortable with the rate, and developed the endurance to attempt something riskier, you’ll should do even more preparation. The more difficult treks need additional money and time, yet it beats a Sunday on the sofa does not it? As well as, when the ladies at the office ask you just how your weekend was, you’ll have stories of adventure, plus photos as well as memories that last.

This type of hiking has to do with leaving town. If you’re brand-new, I recommend beginning with a pre-arranged group. I reside in Calgary when I browse “Calgary hiking teams” I see tons of options, so do the same with your city as well as begin there.

Some gear you’ll need:
- Good hiking boots or shoes
- A moderate-sized, comfy backpack
- A warmer layer in situation it obtains cold
- Water and food
- Cell phone
- Small first aid kit
- Bear spray can be an excellent idea
- A hat
- Emergency rain coat (the $2 disposable variety need to be fine)
- Sunscreen
- Camera
- Replacement shoes laces
- Extra socks
- Sunglasses
- Mosquito repellent
- Small flashlight in situation you finish up strolling in the dark
- Emergency fire-starting supplies
- You likewise might wish to think about toilet paper (simply in situation)

Remember to clothe pleasantly and know that greater elevations could be cooler, even snow-covered relying on how high you’re climbing.

When going out with a team, make sure to select one that is in line with your physical fitness degree. If you require inspiration, e-mail this short article to a friend and ask her or him if they wish to attempt some hiking with you. Doing this as a group, with somebody you’re close to, is an assured incentive. You’ll wind up having great deals of fantastic tales to share as well as having actually recently firmed butts to reveal off won’t harm either.

It’s not a race, so be sure to enjoy the sight while you go to it. We promise it’s more fun compared to seeing reruns on the TV at the gym.

James S. Fell, MBA, is an accredited strength as well as conditioning specialist in Calgary. He writes the syndicated column “In-Your-Face Physical fitness” for the Chicago Tribune and seeks advice from customers on strategic preparing for fitness as well as health and wellness. title: Antibiotics alone are a total horror show.
body:
Almost killed me and 12 years later I am still fighting the assault.  


It is only when you come to understand no human being should ever have contact with these ingredients and the cost has been massive. 


Zero doubt I could be mistaken.  The science is clear.  


Read your own journals and you don’t need to listen to our side although we have the intelligence and the training to understand that this program is the biggest scandal in medical history and the system kills 800,000 per year so yes bigger than those deaths because we are speaking of many millions wrongly injected with no evidence no testing no plan or purpose just more stupid ignorant state licensed technocrats doing a horrible thing to the population.

Get smart mike.
